[@灭世神★圣龙王++6]
#if
CHECKJOB Warrior
#act
;血量
MOV N200 <$STR(C23)>
INC N200 <$MAXHP>
DIV N200 100
MUL N200 85
;攻击
MOV N201 <$STR(C16)>
INC N201 80
MOV N202 <$MAXDC>
DIV N202 100
MUL N202 85
INC N202 150
INC N202 <$STR(C17)>
ChangeBBAbil 6 MaxHP <$STR(N200)>
ChangeBBAbil 6 HP <$STR(N200)>
ChangeBBAbil 6 Ac1 <$STR(C19)>
ChangeBBAbil 6 Ac2 <$STR(C18)>
ChangeBBAbil 6 Mac1 <$STR(C21)>
ChangeBBAbil 6 Mac2 <$STR(C20)>
ChangeBBAbil 6 Dc1 <$STR(N201)>
ChangeBBAbil 6 Dc2 <$STR(N202)>

SendMsg 6 [品质：#7仙品#7,可获得人物属性加成#785%#7]
SendMsg 6 生命:#7[<$BBINFO[6].MinHP>-<$BBINFO[6].MaxHP>]#7攻击:#7[<$BBINFO[6].Dc1>-<$BBINFO[6].Dc2>]#7
